name: Lotto 6/49
description:
Lotto 6/49 - The classical Lotto Game where you guess 6 out of 49 numbers

While in this simulator you cannot win any prizes you may test if your luck stands behind you, and it's better to loose in this game instead of loosing the real one ;]

The game is very simple and it's only focues on guessing the numbers, hope you'll have fun with it!

> If you want to dig around you can also get the Editable version of the Project
> (aka Source Code) for Unreal Engine 4.26
